Events Manager, SEA
Netflix  กรุงเทพมหานคร
19 ชั่วโมงก่อน   ผู้สมัครมากกว่า 200 คน
  
ดูบุคคลที่ Netflix ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร 
บันทึกNetflix aspires to provide great entertainment for people everywhere from the world's best creators across movies, TV series, documentaries, comedy and more. Our members have control over what they watch, when and where. It's an amazing time to join the Netflix team as we continue to transform entertainment. If you are a talented public relations executive with a passion for content and entertainment, keep reading!


About The Role

We are looking to hire a go-getter, creative events manager who can lead the development and delivery of world class events from in-person to virtual and everything in between across South East Asia (SEA) for external and internal audiences. From external-facing events to internal employee-facing events; you should be able to blend strategic thinking with execution at scale. You should not be afraid to push the envelope and bring new ideas to the table, as well as experiment with the latest tools and technologies to elevate our events into unique-to-Netflix experiences. You will have amazing attention to detail, the ability to see the big picture and clearly articulate your vision to internal and external stakeholders, as well as the ability to partner seamlessly, and execute flawlessly in countries across SEA for local and global titles. In bringing titles to life, you will partner seamlessly with a regional team of seasoned event professionals while collaborating with local PR, Content, Marketing teams.

The role combines project management with partnerships, strategic thinking, execution and the smart use of resources for maximum impact. You will need to have strong cross-functional relationships to create, shape, execute and manage events for Netflix content. The successful candidate will be curious about promotional efforts - paying attention to creativity, concept, quality, and time constraints - and will seek to add value and improve campaigns with new and innovative event ideas.


The Work



Creative conceptualization, crafting of creative proposals and quotations
Informed captain on all things events, proactively collating feedback and perspectives from cross-functional partners, including title and market publicists, Photo & AV Studio, Editorial & Publishing, to deliver impactful event campaign strategies
Partner with key stakeholders across multiple disciplines to align on the narratives to build through events
Produce creative and well-executed experiences that are consumer-centric and unique to Netflix
Adaptable to hybrid or virtual events, with knowledge of what it takes online and off, including the latest tools, platforms and technologies to bring our vision to life
External vendor and agency management and supervision
Provide team with strategic direction on sourcing of venues, vendors, entertainment and event related requirements
Superior project, budget and time management skills, within tight deadlines




The Candidate Must



Minimum 10 yrs of events experience preferably from the entertainment industry that includes managing, executing, planning and staffing events at an agency, studio, network or with a brand (experience in film or television awards campaigns is a bonus)
A self starter who is able to work independently, and under pressure, while consistently exercising sound judgment even when faced with ambiguity
Resourceful strategic thinker and creative problem solver
Ability to pivot quickly and maintain a positive attitude and sense of humor
Articulate what is and is not required to deliver a successful campaign
Be transparent and unafraid to challenge, ask questions or call out obstacles
Agile with meticulous attention to details
Excellent organizational skills and ability to roll up your sleeves to get things done
Excellent communication in Thai and English fluency is a plus
Experience working in the Asia-Pacific region is a plus



The Netflix culture attracts talents who exhibit good judgment, innovation, selflessness, courage, impact, candid communication, passion, and curiosity. Read our culture memo. If it resonates with you, maybe you’re the right person to join our team.

We are an equal opportunity employer and celebrate diversity, recognizing that diversity of thought and background builds stronger teams. We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, ethnicity, religion, color, place of birth, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, military service status or disability status.

ดูบุคคลที่คุณรู้จัก

Head of Product (200k)
Routekey  กรุงเทพมหานคร, ประเทศไทย
3 ชั่วโมงก่อน   มาเป็นหนึ่งในผู้สมัคร 25 คนแรก
  
ดูบุคคลที่ Routekey ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกAt Routekey, we're working with a dynamic and innovative tech company that pioneers cutting-edge solutions in e-commerce. We are seeking a visionary and strategic thinker to lead our product team as the Head of Product. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing the entire product lifecycle, from conceptualization to launch and iteration, while aligning with the company's business objectives and user needs.




Responsibilities:

Develop and execute the product strategy, roadmap, and vision, ensuring alignment with business goals and market demands.
Lead and inspire a high-performing product team, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
Collaborate cross-functionally with engineering, design, marketing, and other departments to deliver exceptional products that meet user needs and drive business growth.
Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and analyze data to identify trends and opportunities, guiding product decisions and improvements.
Drive product development through agile methodologies, prioritizing features, and delivering timely releases.
Define and monitor KPIs to assess product performance and iterate based on insights and feedback.




Qualifications:

Proven experience in product management, with at least 3 years in a leadership role within the tech industry.
Demonstrated success in delivering innovative products to market, preferably in e-commerce
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and trends to drive product strategy and decision-making.
Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.

Vinarco Group of Companies  กรุงเทพมหานคร

ดูบุคคลที่ Vinarco Group of Companies ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร 
บันทึกClient: A reputable developer and operator of decentralised solar photovoltaic and energy efficiency projects.

Location: Sathon, Bangkok

Type of Hiring: Permanent

Job Description:


Optimize existing sales channels through the implementation of loyalty programs with current business introducers (EPC, Telesales, or others).
Develop new sales channels to increase the number of leads/opportunities and explore partnerships with industrial zones or other relevant channels.
Conduct in-depth research to identify new market segments, opportunities, and client preferences to support the creation of effective campaigns.
Forecast market trends and monitor competitor offers.
Generate innovative ideas to promote the company's brand and solutions.
Develop business cases to support new marketing strategies, budget requests, projects, and marketing plans.
Utilize customer feedback to ensure client satisfaction.
Enhance COMPANY visibility by implementing a proper strategy in terms of SEO & SEM.
Directly manage the "Communication and Marketing" Manager to supervise and drive activities related to branding and communication, including PR, fairs/exhibitions, conferences, websites, social networks, CSR activities, etc.



Qualifications:


Degree in Marketing, Engineering or a related field.
At least 10 years of experience in Marketing Strategy is required.
Minimum of 3 years of prior work experience as a Marketing Strategist is essential.
Expertise in Branding and Communications is advantageous.
Preferred dual expertise in engineering and marketing.
Proficient in Thai and English with excellent written, spoken, and presentation skills.
Knowledge of the renewable energy sector is a plus.
In-depth knowledge of CRM software and Content Management Systems
Experience with SEO/SEM and Google Analytics
Outstanding organizational and time management skills
Excellent communication, and interpersonal skills
Creative thinker with data-driven analytical aptitude
Independent and proactive attitude, with a demonstrated ability to be a team player.
Proactive and results oriented.
Requires extensive travel within Thailand to meet customers.

บันทึกPosition: Talent Acquisition Team Lead

(Business Unit : Information Technology, Support Function : Marketing, Finance, Accounting, Investor Relations, Human Resources, CEO's Office, etc.)




Responsibilities:




Manage end to end recruitment activities as per CPF's Group recruitment process.
Job briefing, screening CV’s / applications, conducting telephone interviews, providing short lists, scheduling interviews, negotiates & extend offers, coordinate on-boarding activities, etc.
Manage and build the candidates pool by identifying & utilizing various recruitment channels (university partnership, career events, outsourcing, direct sourcing, employer branding, internal resourcing, referral programs, online-offline communication, niche marketing, etc).
Provide recruitment for all positions by Business Unit in responsible including entry-level (new graduates and experienced professionals.)
Work closely with Hiring Manager and HR Business Partners concerning recruitment transactional activities process and support.
Compile and manage data & reporting of recruitment KPIs and SLAs and provide information upon request.
Ensure compliance in area of Recruitment policy.
Coordinates and executes the logistics for recruitment events as appropriate.
Point of contact as Recruitment Business Partner for any customer issues & problems in Recruitment




Qualifications:

Master's or Bachelor’s Degree is required;
Minimum 10 years working experiences in recruiting for the relevant business area or work experience from a recruitment agency is an advantage;
Pleasant personality with strong interpersonal and communication skills;
Communicative in both written and spoken English;
Proficient in Microsoft Office application.




Interested candidate please submit your full English resume with your current and expected remuneration package directly to: karun.k@cpf.co.th

IKEA  กรุงเทพมหานคร
15 ชั่วโมงก่อน   มาเป็นหนึ่งในผู้สมัคร 25 คนแรก
  
ดูบุคคลที่ IKEA ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกCompany Description

IKEA is the world’s largest home furnishing retailer with 460 stores across more than 60 countries. IKEA Thailand is part of Ikano Retail, one of 12 IKEA franchisees and the only one owned by the family of Ingvar Kamprad, who founded IKEA in 1943.

IKEA Thailand creates a better everyday life by offering a wide range of well-designed, functional home furnishing products at prices so low, that as many people as possible can afford them. Ikano (Thailand) Ltd. owns and operates three omnichannel stores in Thailand, including IKEA Bangna, IKEA Bang Yai and IKEA Phuket. To learn more, visit IKEA.co.th

Job Description

You deliver an easy buying experience for all customers throughout the complete payment process and joyful shopping experience for all IKEA visitors and customers. This includes handling payment in a reliable, efficient, accurate and friendly way as well as supporting the check-out co-worker in their daily work.


Ensure that our check-outs are efficiently equipped at all times throughout the day and in shape as new.
Have the knowledge, confidence, responsibility, authority and desire to support customer payment and that they achieve this in an efficient and simple way.
Be present in the check-out area in order to support the check-out co-workers and ensure customers leave with a positive impression of the IKEA store.
Deliver a fast and positive payment experience by steering the check-out operation in a friendly, customer-focused and cost-efficient manner.
Follow cash handling procedures to ensure the security of money handling.


Qualifications


Be passionate about customers and always strive to deliver a positive shopping experience.
Experience in consistently meeting and exceeding customer needs through understanding the customers in a service industry.
Ability to prioritise and organise work and the work of others in order to make the most efficient use of the time available.
Confident decision-maker
Ability to communicate clearly and confidently in English.
Computer proficient
Knowledge of the IKEA product range, including service products.
Interested in people’s everyday life at home and home furnishing.


Additional Information

Please apply by 17 December 2023.

Paron S.
Paron S.
Business Development (Sales & Recruitment Consultant) at Pasona Thailand 【Open to connect】

Position: Branding Communication Strategic Leader (EV Car)

Business: Advertising media Agency (integrating media for marketing and communication, and developing innovative services)




Salary: 80,000-120,000 THB as Total Package (Depends on Negotiation)




Work location: MRT Sukhumvit / BTS Asoke

Work hours: Monday – Friday 09.00/11:00-18.00/20:00 (Flexible Hour)




Requirement

- Proficient in communicating in English or Chinese at an advanced level, holding a bachelor's degree in advertising, sales, or marketing.

- Over 10 years of experience working in advertising agencies, preferably in a 4A-sized company or public relations agency with experience managing brand clients.

- Knowledgeable and familiar with the automotive industry in Thailand, including marketing, competition, and understanding the needs of customers and end-users.

- Experience in strategic planning and integrated marketing communication (IMC), including team management in the strategic department.

- Comprehensive skills in strategy and marketing, covering:

- Marketing strategy skills and post-operational communication strategy skills.

- Expertise in tools and resources (media/social media/platform/Big Data).

- Expertise in advertising and brand understanding, systematic strategy skills, and excellent article writing skills.

- Knowledge of both theoretical and practical aspects of marketing.

- Positive attitude towards work, self-driven with the ability to create motivation, and efficiently innovative under pressure. A good leader with effective team management techniques.




Responsibilities:

- Develop a distinctive and prominent advertising strategy, including the ability to provide strategic advice to customers in both marketing and competitive situations.

- Manage the overall branding of the car project, including promoting the brand and car models, employing a mixed marketing strategy that integrates offline and online media, digital marketing, and social media.

- Lead a team to analyze customer needs, survey market data to plan each stage, and coordinate with relevant departments to achieve the brand's marketing objectives according to the plan.

- Lead the team to achieve monthly and yearly marketing plans (offline and online media) as proposed.

- Control the main strategic direction and the quality of work to be disseminated, ensuring successful communication of strategic messages and reporting results to customers comprehensively.

- Manage team operations and achieve annual goals, understanding and responding well to customer needs, leading the team to develop and create annual marketing plans for new products and projects.




.

If you’re interested in this position, please submit your English resume by clicking the Apply button or contacting K. Paron for more information by Line ID: paron_pasona

.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon

สมัคร
บันทึกส่งข้อความโดยตรงถึงผู้ประกาศรับสมัครงานจาก SHEIN

Chloe Liao
Chloe Liao
SHEIN | HRBP Manager | Bilingual

About SHEIN

SHEIN is a global fashion and lifestyle e-retailer committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all. We use on-demand manufacturing technology to connect suppliers to our agile supply chain, reducing inventory waste and enabling us to deliver a variety of affordable products to customers around the world. From our global offices, we reach customers in more than 150 countries.

To learn more about SHEIN, follow us at shein.com, instagram.com/sheinofficial and youtube.com/shein.




Summary

As a KOL Marketing Specialist/Manager at SHEIN, you will be responsible for developing and executing influencer marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility, engagement, and drive sales. You will play a key role in building and maintaining relationships with key opinion leaders (KOLs), influencers, and content creators to amplify SHEIN's presence in the fashion and lifestyle space.




Responsibilities:




Strategy Development

Devise and implement KOL marketing strategies aligned with SHEIN's brand objectives.
Identify and analyze market trends, competitor activities, and audience preferences to optimize influencer campaigns.




Influencer Relationship Management

Build and nurture relationships with KOLs, influencers, and content creators.
Negotiate and execute influencer partnerships, ensuring alignment with brand values and goals.




Project Execution

Plan and execute end-to-end influencer marketing campaigns and events, including content creation, product placements, and sponsored collaborations.
Monitor project performance, analyze data, and provide insights for continuous improvement.




Content Collaboration

Collaborate with influencers to create engaging and authentic content that resonates with SHEIN's target audience.
Ensure all content adheres to brand guidelines and promotes a positive brand image. 5. Budget Management:
Manage the influencer marketing budget effectively, maximizing ROI and ensuring cost-effectiveness.




Reporting and Analytics

Generate regular reports on the performance of influencer campaigns, providing actionable insights for future strategies.
Utilize analytics tools to measure and analyze the impact of KOL marketing initiatives.




Job Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.
Proven experience in influencer marketing, preferably in the fashion or e-commerce industry.
Strong understanding of social media platforms, trends, and influencer landscapes.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Creative thinker with a passion for staying updated on industry trends.

ดูบุคคลที่ CPF Group ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกPosition: Manager - Consumer Market Insight (CP-Meiji)




Responsibilities

Responsible for Domestic B2C on Shopper Panel, Brand Tracking, New Product Development Research, or ad-hoc research focusing in Thailand market.
Deliver meaningful insight and foresight of Thailand market analysis synthesizing trend, market, consumer and shopper data by identifying issue and opportunity to commercial team action plan.
Be a part of Domestic CMI B2C team to drive “Data driven culture” by optimizing cross function knowledge and utilization of Shopper Panel, Brand Health Tracking, and Domestic Consumer data insight.




KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:

Research and analytical thinking skill

-Able to analyze market and category understanding using Syndicated Data & Brand Tracking

-Able to manage quantitative and/or qualitative research methodologies with minimal supervision

-Ability to utilize and integrate all data sources and translate into relevant business insight and opportunity

Critical thinking
Business analysis & strategy
Knowledge on Syndicated Tools e.g. Kantar World Panel, NielsenIQ, EGG data




Qualifications

Bachelor degree or above in marketing, economics, or statistics
Minimum 3-5 years in research with solid background in:

First Priority: Consumer & Shopper Insight quantitative & qualitative research and Brand Health Tracking.

Second Priority: Syndicated data: Kantar World Panel, NielsenIQ, POS data, Loyalty Card data.

Experience in market analysis by using Syndicated data and turn in to actionable insights.
Experience in developing, executing, and leading analysis both consumer research and shopper research.
Fluent in English language with good communication skill and presentation skill.
Detail oriented, but with ability to look at the bigger picture and story telling.
Ability to work individually (end-to-end) and cross-functional team environment.




Interested candidate please submit your full English resume with your current and expected remuneration package directly to: karun.k@cpf.co.th

ดูบุคคลที่ Shopee ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร 
บันทึกJob Description




Key Responsibility (Product)




Develop, assess, and manage requirements and roadmap for both products, the SBS modules (PMS, FBS, SRM) and the SHP systems.
Oversee platform/application usage, licenses, and maintenance to ensure optimal performance and compliance.
Perform configuration and small development tasks within the SBS modules and SHP system, ensuring they align with business needs and requirements.
Collaborate closely with implementation vendors and partners, providing guidance and direction throughout the implementation process.
Work closely with other Product Owners and Developer team members to successfully deliver business and technology programs according to the established plan.
Conduct regular assessments and evaluations of the SBS modules and SHP system to identify areas for improvement, risks, and issues and recommend enhancements or mitigation.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in the fulfillment business, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
Drive user adoption and training initiatives to ensure effective utilization of the SBS modules and SHP systems across the organization.
Support operations to investigate and resolve daily bugs/minor issues

Monitor feedback and measure the performance of process adjustment.
Manage ad-hoc project assignments.




Requirements




Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Business Engineering, Business, Supply Chain, Logistics or similar fields. Master’s Degree/MBA is a plus.
+3 years of technical program/product management experience in a fast-paced environment
Excellent interpersonal skills, energetic and a self-starter
Excellent presentation and project management skills are necessary
Strong organizational skills along with the demonstrated ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and able to react to shifting priorities to meet business needs
Effective communicator (written and verbal). Able to communicate effectively with both business and technical teams.
Strong problem-solver and detail-oriented.
The ability and positive mindset to "figure things out
Demonstrated analytical and quantitative skills
Influential ability to convey a recommendation or story with insight & strategic thinking
Teamwork and leadership skills
Customer-oriented mindset is a plus

ดูบุคคลที่ Cross Hotels & Resorts ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกส่งข้อความโดยตรงถึงผู้ประกาศรับสมัครงานจาก Cross Hotels & Resorts

Buddhachard Paengchai
Buddhachard Paengchai
Cross Hotels & Resorts - VP Marketing Communications

At Cross Hotels & Resorts, our passion for hospitality drives everything we do. Our success is built on the fact that we do things differently and our brands remain relentlessly relevant.




If you are ready to exceed the needs of our stakeholders and you think you have what it takes, apply now and join as a team of APAC’s Hotel Management operator of choice for hotel owners seeking an innovative alternative to the global chains.




JOB DESCRIPTION




As the Head of People & Culture, you'll lead HR strategies, foster a positive workplace culture, and drive employee engagement. Responsibilities include talent acquisition, performance management, learning and development initiatives, and ensuring alignment between organizational goals and workforce capabilities. You'll also focus on employee well-being, diversity and inclusion, and maintaining a vibrant company culture. Additionally, you'll collaborate with leadership to shape policies that support the organization's values and growth. Strong communication and leadership skills are essential for success in this role.




CORE TASKS, DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES




ORGANISATIONAL LEADERSHIP AND STRATEGY DEVELOPMENT

• Apply knowledge and expertise in specialist People and Culture areas, providing innovative ideas and solutions.

• Develop and implement Cross Hotels & Resorts’ HR strategy, ensuring it meets organisational priorities and promotes diversity, inclusion and equality among staff – periodically reviewing strategy outcomes to ensure it remains relevant to changing organisational needs, circumstances and stays linked to other support function/operational strategies.

• Develop and govern People policies, procedures, and guidelines as required. Promotes consistency and fairness in their execution – ensuring all local required legislations are adhered to, and ongoing training of People policies takes place.

• Maintain and develop People Culture information systems and tools. Explore new technologies where appropriate – introducing and overseeing the preparation and analysis of People and Culture metrics and providing feedback that supports decision-making in specified areas.

• Provide regular advice, guidance, and where necessary challenges SWOT Team and Hotel General Managers on their people management, performance and development plans/issues.

• Maintains relationships and participates with external People and Culture networks.




TEAM LEADERSHIP

• Lead and manage hotel level HR teams who are responsible for the day-to-day delivery of HR services and further develop an effective business partnership model that is responsive and agile; meeting expectations of internal stakeholders.

• Promote professional development of team members and facilitate ongoing performance management including, but not limited to; objective setting, identifying learning and development needs, coaching, and welfare.

• Motivate, encourage and support hotel level HR in the design and delivery of high-quality services.

• Create and maintain key performance indicators – ensuring external good practice and thinking is reflected internally.

• Oversee People information systems, tools and financial planning of the department.

• Support cross-organisational work practices and ensure that the hotel level HR teams influence, and is influenced by, organisational discussions, lessons and decisions.




ORGANISATIONAL SUPPORT AND SERVICES

• Responsible for ensuring that we live our core values in our everyday work life

• Ensure innovative recruitment and succession planning is in place: oversee fair and effective processes to attract and bring on board new team members while processing learning from the experiences of those who leave.

• Stimulate global team members engagement and involvement. Work with team members, and lead engagement surveys to ensure feedback is used to generate reflection, learning and improvement.

• Ensure recognition and reward program/strategy is reviewed periodically and its deployment is transparent and in line with organisational values.

• Oversee annual processes to assess and update team members pay rate and benefits, ensuring good performance is valued and adjustments are implemented fairly.

• Encourage and strengthen a culture and practice of forward HR planning – ensuring HR considerations are reflected accurately in new programme design and annual planning processes.

• Act as an innovative, transformational leader who challenges and/or supports SWOT and hotel level leadership teams




GOOD PEOPLE MANAGEMENT PRACTICE

• Advocate for good practices that promotes development and wellbeing of all Cross Hotels & Resorts team members, including a focus on work/life balance.

• Develop and support leaders and team member across the organisation to organise and deliver their priorities effectively through their teams – providing inspiration to advance leadership development processes.

• Champion and advance diversity within the organisation to assist teams understand and live Cross Hotels & Resorts’ core values – help ensure our identity as a peace building organisation is reflected in our ways of working and recruitment.

• Ensure performance review systems are updated, implemented regularly, and lead to positive interaction and follow-up among staff – assisting in identifying ways staff recognition and development initiatives can be met.

• Design and cultivate learning and development strategies to help team members identify areas where skills and experience can be expanded and performance grows – working with others to ensure an appropriate range of tools, resources and development opportunities are accessible across the organisation.




JOB QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS




• Thai nationality with successful completion of higher education

• Minimum of 5 years’ experience in a progressive organization with People, Culture, Learning and Development exposure

• Excellent command of spoken and written English

• Able to travel and work short stints globally Excellent communication and interpersonal skill

• Strong team playing skill and problem solving

GM - Growth & Sales Operations
CARS24  กรุงเทพมหานคร

ดูบุคคลที่ CARS24 ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกABOUT CARS24:




Cars24 is a used vehicle e-commerce unicorn that has reached a billion dollars in sales in five years since inception in 2015. We are backed by both Softbank, Tencent, DST and Alpha Wave Capital with the most recent fundraise of $300mn bringing our valuation to $3.3 billion. In South East Asia, with Thailand being the regional GTM hub, the intent is to fundamentally redefine the used car buying experience for consumers, including all touch points such as searching, buying, financing, insurance and warranty.




ABOUT THE ROLE:




As the GM of Growth & Sales Ops in Thailand your key responsibilities include:

Rapidly growing funnel of customers coming to the platform:
Work with Marketing, Product and Offline Sales teams to ensure higher customer acquisition through all relevant channels
Work with CRM team to provide digital cues to nudge customers to complete their car buying journey with Cars24
Identify suitable opportunities and develop execution plans to unlock growth
Improve Funnel conversions:
Ensure high conversion from Test drive to Sales
Develop trackers and monitor progress against key initiatives to improve conversions
Consistently strive to reduce TAT from Test drive to delivery
Empower the on-ground team with the right tools
Develop monthly and quarterly sales plan along with sizing & tracking of Key initiatives
Build and manage a cross-functional team of Sales Ops and Growth
Ensure focus on a holistic customer experience including a smooth test drive, delivery and post sale experience
Coordinate with internal stakeholders from sourcing, operations, finance to ensure sales and fulfilment process is run smoothly
Special projects: Drive improvement (e.g. process improvement) and strategic projects on an ad-hoc basis.
Reporting: Develop KPIs & reports, establish required reporting governance and processes and track KPIs on an ongoing basis.
Analysis & decision support: Analyse plan/KPI deviations, identify root causes & make recommendations for improvement actions. Provide decision support and develop business cases & financial analyses (e.g. insource vs. outsource decisions, etc.).




The role reports to the AVP Commercial in Thailand and will be based in Bangkok.




WHAT WE NEED:




5+ years of experience in sales and customer operations in Thailand
A good understanding of the Thai auto industry or any B2C auto experience with OEMs, large B2C dealerships, used cars platforms, etc. is an advantage
Previous experience in the Growth role of a high-growth startup is preferred
Ability to converse effectively in both English and Thai
Drive and hustle for continually developing and running sales operations efficiently
Strong analytical ability with a data-driven approach to making decisions
Excellent people skills, an ability to collaborate with different stakeholders and apply a cross-functional mindset
Ability to learn quickly and transfer knowledge
Driven by working hard, being challenged in a fast-paced environment, and having fun while doing so




WHAT WE OFFER:




Ground-up opportunity: Build a big business from scratch and shape the strategic direction of the market, changing the way people buy cars
Amazing people & network: You are not alone - we keep standards high for anyone who joins us here
Learning & Development: We focus on employee training both on the job and in organised special sessions. We also have access to an amazing list of advisors and investors that we actively engage
Insurance & Medical benefits: Subsidised health support for your family & you across Life, Surgery, Inpatient, Outpatient & more
Focus on mental health: Active counselling to help you pass through tumultuous times
Truly Global Experience - With teams spanning across 3 continents we are a truly global organisation and offer rich, diverse and multicultural experiences
Competitive pay: Full-time salary at market rates




OUR VALUES:




We’ve told you what CARS24 does. But what is the big picture that we abide by? What values keep driving us to help our customers drive the vehicle they choose?
We trust, and build trust - We work hard to get the customer to trust us, and we do it by placing them first. Whether it’s evaluation, customer protection policies, warranties, or just customer support - we’re there for every customer, every stakeholder. This is the bedrock of everything we do, and we work hard with committed goals and timelines to keep improving.
We invest in employees and partners - A natural extension of our first point - A culture of trust and cooperation means that every employee and partner is a crucial part of our ecosystem. We invest in every one of them, and we measure success not only in terms of profits and balance sheets but in the success each employee and partner sees in their professional and personal lives.
Taking ownership - We don’t believe in a system of micromanagement and constant oversight. We train our employees to take control, and they are the owners of the work they do. This is inculcated from the time we hire to each project that comes their way, and in our mind, this is what defines a great workplace - the number of people willing to take ownership.
Have high standards. Top high results - Perfection and progress is what we work towards. And once we achieve that, we move the bar higher and higher, so we can keep outdoing ourselves.
We’re a meritocracy - We never let exceptional performance go unrewarded. We encourage healthy competition, but never at the expense of others. Everyone has a chance to succeed, and a chance to reap the benefit.... After all, the more talented people we have on board, the more there is to accomplish and reward.
We’re frugal, in a prudent way - We’re all for spending, but only when we see it adding value - to our employees, partners, customers, or any other stakeholder. A great workplace isn’t defined by bells and whistles like grand offices and fancy food, but in learning, value and profits that benefit every member of CARS24.
We’re in it for the long haul - CARS24 is on a long journey, and we’re not taking any shortcuts. The milestones we pass, like quarterly results and yearly targets are but smaller rewards in our longer and uncompromising drive to the very top, and the success we see in the long term is what keeps us going.

บันทึกClient: A reputable developer and operator of decentralised solar photovoltaic and energy efficiency projects.

Location: Sathon, Bangkok or HCMC, Vietnam

Type of Hiring: Permanent

Job Description: Strengthen the implementation of HSE across countries (TH, VN, KH).


Lead and consolidate the governance system to efficiently manage HSE risks and impacts across all COMPANY initiatives in the region.
Define distinct roles for all project stakeholders in managing HSE-related matters during the development and operation of COMPANY's assets.
Contribute to the continual improvement of COMPANY's operational HSE performance.
Ensure the alignment of our global policy with local regulations and its uniform implementation and adherence across various locations (HSE Risk Assessment, Action plan, emergency preparedness and response, Grievance mechanism, Monthly reporting, etc.).
Provide necessary support and training for resources dedicated to HSE to scrutinize HSE risks and impacts throughout project development, construction, and operational phases.
Review EPC/AM contracts, ensuring the integration of applicable HSE requirements before signing.
Supervise the execution of action plans aimed at mitigating adverse impacts of projects on all stakeholders.
Provide support and guidance to COMPANY's EPC or O&M contractors in developing and executing these plans, including establishing proper communication and consultation channels.
Establish control and governance rules to facilitate the self-improvement of all HSE-related procedures within COMPANY.
Coordinate HSE audits and training to enhance safety awareness among the team, contractors, and partners.
Organise comprehensive HSE reporting to the Head Quarter.



Qualifications:


Bachelor's Degree or higher in Occupational health and safety / Environmental (HSE) or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in a similar role in Muti-national environment would be advantageous.
Proficient in English with excellent written, spoken, and presentation skills.
Technical expertise in HSE matters.
Strong HSE advisory background.
Sound knowledge of OHSAS 18001/ISO 45001 systems.
Prior experience in health and safety management in an industrial setting.
Experience in managing environmental and social risks for large industrial projects would be a plus.
Ability to engage effectively with a diverse range of stakeholders.
Willingness to travel overseas for at least one week per month.
Open to local expatriates residing in Thailand or Vietnam.

AIRPORT SERVICES OFFICER- THAILAND
Emirates  กรุงเทพมหานคร
16 ชั่วโมงก่อน   มาเป็นหนึ่งในผู้สมัคร 25 คนแรก
  
ดูบุคคลที่ Emirates ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร 
บันทึกJob Purpose

Ensure a safe, efficient, cost effective and timely airport operation so that Emirates image, reputation and customer service levels are maintained and enhanced, as per the criteria set forth by the Companys commercial, safety and security policies, standards and procedures. Plan, organise and control all aspects of the overall operation including effective co-ordination of all internal and external departments such as Handling Agents, caterers, other airlines, and various authorities at the airport, to ensure customers are provided with a high level of service. Manage and supervise staff on duty ensuring that the relevant areas of the operation are fully covered and assume responsibility for running of the Station during the absences of the Airport Services Manager. Job Outline: - Analyse anticipated operational problems such as overbookings, adverse weather conditions, delays, cancellation of flights, crew flight time limitations etc., undertaking necessary remedial action to ensure disruptions are minimised and the customer service levels are not impacted. - Ensure that Handling Agent, caterers and other service providers are fully briefed regarding Emirates? requirements for the day?s operation including any special handling, and update this information as necessary in order to ensure a smooth operation and avoid unnecessary expenditure and inconvenience to our customers. - Control expenditure on damage baggage replacement and lost baggage claims. Delegate some of the baggage claims processing to the Supervisors/ASAs, to ensure all of the baggage services aspects are processed effectively and in a timely manner. - Assist the Airport Services Manager in preparing and maintaining the staff duty roster and in preparing the staff annual leave plan as necessary and ensure staffing levels are optimised. - Undertake various administrative duties delegated by Airport Services Manager including attending various meetings as directed and ensure Emirates interests/requirements are appropriately represented at such meetings. - Assist the ASM in Employee Regulation Programme and in conducting staff performance reviews in line with Performance Matters (i.e. setting staff?s objectives and development plan) and support, coach and guide staff members to ensure maintenance of customer service and other standards such as grooming. - Manage and administer all operational/supervisory activities on a shift basis and ensure appropriate control of processes related to document and information consolidation (revenue documents , cargo, handling reports etc) in order to safeguard revenues, operational data and avoid discrepancies. - Monitoring of all operational units (Customer Services, Ticket desk, Ramp and Lounge). Establish a regular reporting mechanism to ensure there is a timely and consistent monitoring of service delivery, across operations. Monitor KPI?s for service performance and ensure that these KPI?s are met consistently by each unit. - Under take projects from time to time as advised by the Airport Services Manager in relation to operational standards and procedures thereby improving efficiency and quality of service delivered at the station. Assist ASM in ERP (Emergency Response Planning) and other related tasks. - Ensure Passenger Service and Ground Operations Manual updates are communicated and adhered to, internally and by relevant service providers. Promote a continuously improving culture of safety, with open reporting of safety deficiencies, human factor issues and compliance with local laws to uphold the delivery of safe and secure operations.

Qualifications & Experience

Airport Operations.Passenger Handling : Minimum `A' Level or equivalent (Higher Secondary School). Must have completed relevant and recognised professional training courses in Customer Services and Ground Operations. Experience: Given the specific requirements at outstations, a minimum of 5 years experience is required in Airport. Customer handling / Operations including at least 3 years in a supervisory position. Knowledge/Skills: A working knowledge of Reservations/Fares and Ticketing, Departure Control Systems. Knowledge of Dangerous Goods Regulations & Weight & Balance. Knowledge of Baggage Tracing and Claims Handling. Knowledge of Microsoft Word/ E-mail / Excel advantageous and local languages. Fluency in spoken and written English and required local language. Please note that you must have the right to live and work in Thailand.

Salary & Benefits

Join our growing team and enjoy a competitive remuneration package, discounts on flights and hotel stays. Find out more about working with us in our website www.emirates.com/careers

Data Science

ดูบุคคลที่ Western Digital ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกCompany Description

At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.

At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.

We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.

Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.

We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.

Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data.

Job Description

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:


Work with data scientists, data engineers, software engineers, process & product engineers, design engineers, etc collaboratively to develop new data science solutions that improve productivity and operations metrics.
Leverage data mining techniques in mathematics, statistics, information technology, machine learning, deep learning, visualization etc to discover insightful patterns.
Develop/take an idea, access and prepare necessary data to create machine learning models.
Deploy models and solutions using DevOps/MLOps tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, MLflow to ensure scalability and reproducibility.
Demonstrate proficiency in version control using Git and collaborate with a team of data scientists in code review and development processes.
Prepare and deliver presentations with data visualizations and business conclusions.


Qualifications

Qualification


Masters or Bachelor Degree in Computer science, data science, computer engineering, information technology, or relevant work experience and education background.
We will also consider applicants with the equivalent combination of education, technical expertise, training, or work experience.
Preferably minimum 1-2 years of working experience in related field.
Fresh graduates are also encouraged to apply.


Skills


Required: Python, R, Tensorflow framework, Computer Vision.
SQL, Relational databases, Big Data platforms, AWS Redshift etc.
Familiar with some of the following Statistical Analysis & Modelling Tools: JMP, Minitab, SPSS, Enterprise Miner, Enterprise Guide, SAS coding.
Familiarity with core techniques in statistical and machine learning e.g. regularized regression, time series analysis, tree base models, boosting algorithms, neural networks, frequentist and Bayesian inference, power calculation, clustering, collaborative filtering, NLP, cross-validation and bootstrapping, and data visualization
Practical experience in application of ML and Deep Learning algorithms.
Familiar with collaborative solutions, model & code versioning (Github), and solution packaging (Docker)
Ability to deploy data science solutions in cloud analytics infrastructure and AWS


Additional Information

Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.

Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

สมัคร
บันทึกAbout the Team

As part of Management Consulting’s market leading People & Organisation Consulting business, we help our clients in solving their most important and challenging business problems. Every day we challenge ourselves to do what matters most for our clients, our people and for the society. We offer the opportunity to be part of a firm that has the purpose of building trust in society and solving important problems, that gives you the opportunity to work with inspiring leaders and talented professionals to deliver outstanding value to our clients in a culture that is diverse, inclusive, collaborative and one that provides exceptional career experience.




Working within a high performing team and collaborating closely with other parts of PwC, you will be responsible for adding value to your client portfolio through the delivery of People & Organisation projects in the field of HR Transformation, Change Management, Leadership, Culture, Organisation Design, Workforce Transformation and People Analytics.




About the Role

Define, structure and implement improvements to the operation of the HR function and the overall impact and value that HR can drive for the business
Review HR processes, structure, technologies and use data & analytics to drive business alignment
Maximise organisational and HR performance and establish a culture focused on optimising business value
Assess, design and implement operating models aligned to the client’s strategic objectives
Drive change enablement for clients as part of large transformation programs
Manage teams to ensure on time, on budget delivery and achievement of outcomes
Support the sales cycle and help with practice development and eminence building
Support development of junior consultants by actively guiding them




About you

Demonstrate problem solving skills and the ability to work in complex and dynamic environments
Minimum 5 - 10 years of relevant experience within the human capital domain, including consulting experience
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Experience managing, coaching and mentoring junior team members
Ability to build and sustain client relationships
Collaboration and participation within a highly diverse and inclusive team
Ability to work independently and lead projects or large streams of work
Good subject matter knowledge across a range of HR/workforce-related capabilities such as HRT/change management/leadership/organisation design
Ability to multitask and prioritise workload with good working knowledge of Microsoft Office suite
Good Thai and English communication skills

Strategic Marketing Manager – Intercontinental
GE HealthCare  กรุงเทพมหานคร
18 ชั่วโมงก่อน   ผู้สมัครมากกว่า 200 คน
  
ดูบุคคลที่ GE HealthCare ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร 
บันทึกJob Description Summary

INTERCONTINENTAL (Japan, ASEAN, Korea, ANZ, South Asia, Latin Americas) is a key growth region for GE Healthcare with an aspiration to reach >$3B over next 3 years by accelerating penetration in existing market/customer segments and expanding into adjacencies. Given the region’s growth ambitions, we are seeking a Strategic Marketing Professional to optimize expansion in existing markets, identify new growth markets, support creation of strategies/proposals and execution on those opportunities in collaboration with sub-region organization. On a day-to-day basis, the role holder will work directly with Strategy & Program Director for the Intercontinental region and sub-regional leadership including Marketing, Commercial Excellence, Product, Sales and Service leaders and will be the point of contact for global market/competitive intelligence, commercial and marketing teams.GE HealthCare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our purpose is to create a world where healthcare has no limits. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.

Job Description

Responsibilities

Market Analysis & Reporting


Analyze market performance (e.g., market size, growth, share, visibility, win-rate, profitability) by coordinating with commercial excellence / marketing teams across different product groups/sub-regions.
Conduct quarterly market estimate in collaboration with sub-region / global segment team and maintain up to date PowerBI Market Performance Dashboard
Identify consolidated drivers of strength and weakness in market, competitive intelligence/competitor strategies/actions, and underlying secular themes to explain commercial performance and areas for targeting counter-measures.
Periodically report actual and forecasted performance of commercial metrics to the Intercontinental and leadership team via Monthly Operating Review (MOR), Product Operating Review (POR), Segment Operating Review (SOR)


Marketing Strategy Development


Frequently collaborate with Marketing, segment team, and external 3rd parties to identify potential areas of adjacencies that can deliver topline and operating margin growth.
Validate growth opportunities by conducting deep research and analysis on critical and prioritized problems, including market dynamics, customer behavior, unmet needs, and best practice case studies.
Organize cross-functional session and workshop to share findings, evaluate options define potential solutions, and build associated business case.
Ultimately, you will establish well supported solutions with specific recommendations that will enable executive management team to make critical go/no go decisions.


Long-Term Strategy, Budget Planning, and Strategic Project execution


Support the Intercontinental strategic planning process including forecasting marketing and order metrics, executing customer VoC, investment business case development and prioritization.
Support execution of Intercontinental wide strategic projects. Employ best-in-class project management framework (e.g., owner, milestones, transformation), operating mechanisms/review cadence (e.g. bi-weekly, monthly) to deliver on time/on-budget and regularly update management on status and progress.


Qualifications


Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in engineering, Business Administration, or related field
5-8 years’ experience in consulting, product marketing or related field
Strong analytical and process skills
Excellent oral and written communications skills
Experience with Microsoft Office Suite (PowerPoint, Excel, and Word)
Experience with PowerBI and willingness to learn.
Leadership skills – capable of executing projects on time and on budget.
Team oriented – ability to motivate and work well with diverse, cross-functional teams.
Influencing skills – ability to motivate individuals and demonstrate organizational influence.


Preferred Qualifications


Past experience in management consulting experience preferred.
Deep expertise in market & customer insights, product commercialization and branding for healthcare medical device or industrial B2B products.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, highly matrixed environment.
Results-oriented, highly motivated, and able to develop and implement complex projects.
Flexible and have a “can do” and positive attitude.


Inclusion and Diversity

GE HealthCare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.

Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.



Additional Information

Relocation Assistance Provided: No

ดูบุคคลที่ VaynerMedia ได้ว่าจ้างสำหรับตำแหน่งนี้
สมัคร
บันทึกWhat's up? We're VaynerMedia! We are a contemporary global creative and media agency with an expertise in driving relevance for clients and delivering impactful business results. The independently-owned agency was founded in 2009 and has offices in New York, Los Angeles, London, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Japan and Mexico City. VaynerMedia has been recognized for its work at Cannes Lions, the Clio Awards and The Webby Awards. It is part of the VaynerX family of companies.

Culture is our key and Empathy is how we build it. VaynerMediaAPAC is strong with a world-class combination of diverse backgrounds collaborating to put forward innovative, creative and strategic solutions to the one advantage that stands the test of time --- PEOPLE. Day in and day out, we propel some of the biggest brands in the world to the intersection of attention and culture. In APAC, we are proudly +200, servicing a diverse client all around the region.

The PITCH

We are looking for a Senior Art Director who has the know-how and skills to work hands-on who can own and guide the creative process from ideation to execution. Sometimes you'll be leading a team of designers to make a volume of memes and GIFs that'll make people laugh and cry. Sometimes you'll be collaborating in a brainstorm for a big campaign. Sometimes you'll be on set—using your eye to make sure everything in frame looks "just so." Every task is challenging, but highly rewarding.

You'll be joining a tightly-knit creative team working on an established entertainment brand and have the opportunity to possibly work on more. The team is a diverse mix of makers, creators, and ideators from musicians to viral TikTokers. But we're all passionate about our mission: How do we level-up our clients to be the next big thing? This will be a 6 months contract role, with a hybrid working arrangement.

Are you based in Bangkok? Geeking the creative world in the Vietnam market for six plus years now? Oh well, we could be meant to be --

Here's where you come in.


Integrate seamlessly art, copy, and editing techniques, and guides the team across each.
You are a creator and an ideator who can execute at both a high speed and volume.
Capable of working with large creative groups, and with cross-functional disciplines with the agency.
Masters crafts and ideas accompanied by delivering high quality, actionable feedback.
Connecting the dots between culture and content to make concise and relevant creative recommendations.
Championing the look and feel of your brands. (Style guides are your bible.)
Support CDs, ACDs and win new business pitches.
Help review and optimize the juniors output while making sure they are being developed as creative problem solvers.
Assisting in the development and delivery of creative solutions, from content work to larger campaign initiatives for a variety of clients and industries. This includes both executing work on your own as well as managing and approving the work of your assigned creative team.
Assists in developing company wide creative processes including voice and content workshops, brief sessions, high priority brainstorms, emerging technology and social opportunities, and innovating on campaign work.
Understanding, articulating, and strategically applying the latest social best-practices to every creative opportunity.
Masters industry best practices and be able to articulate the unique VaynerMedia POV
Embodies strong creative vision and understanding of client and agency business needs and objectives.


Your Experience


6+ years of relevant work experience in the creative media or advertising field in the Thailand market.
Collaborate with our creative and strategy teams, to create and manipulate video, a plethora of photography, social copy, gifs, short clips, streaming stories, etc.
Self-starter and demonstrates ability to get things done without direct supervision and understand what it means to deliver excellence to clients.
Wrangle and roll with your teammates on rapid-fire requests and seriously tight timelines while keeping a chill, proactive attitude.
Lastly, think logically even under pressure and come up with innovative solutions to problems.


What You Should Know About VaynerMedia

Think "lab" and not "agency". We get excited about solving business problems, not creating advertising for the sake of making advertising. Our entrepreneurship DNA runs deep. We're willing to break rules, try new things, and test hypotheses if it means better understanding our craft. It's fun!

Our environment (and pace) feels much more like a start-up than most agencies you might be used to. Hopefully that, and the opportunity to collaborate with the talented and enthusiastic crew, work with big brands excites you, as it does us. We can't wait to meet you.

P.S Send us your portfolio --- always excited to see some unicorn talents :)
